67class inet6_address : public sock_address
68{
70 sockaddr_in6 addr_{};
71
73 static constexpr size_t SZ = sizeof(sockaddr_in6);
74
75public:
77 static constexpr sa_family_t ADDRESS_FAMILY = AF_INET6;
78
83 inet6_address() = default;
90 inet6_address(const in6_addr& addr, in_port_t port);
97 explicit inet6_address(in_port_t port) : inet6_address(in6_addr{}, port) {}
106 inet6_address(const string& saddr, in_port_t port);
115 inet6_address(const string& saddr, in_port_t port, error_code& ec) noexcept;
122 inet6_address(const sockaddr_storage& addr) { std::memcpy(&addr_, &addr, SZ); }
127 inet6_address(const sock_address& addr) { std::memcpy(&addr_, addr.sockaddr_ptr(), SZ); }
132 inet6_address(const sockaddr_in6& addr) { std::memcpy(&addr_, &addr, SZ); }
137 inet6_address(const inet6_address& addr) : addr_(addr.addr_) {}
143 static inet6_address loopback(in_port_t port) {
144 const in6_addr LOOPBACK IN6ADDR_LOOPBACK_INIT;
145 return inet6_address{LOOPBACK, port};
146 }
154 bool is_set() const noexcept override { return addr_.sin6_family == ADDRESS_FAMILY; }
161 static result<in6_addr> resolve_name(const string& saddr) noexcept;
168 static result<inet6_address> create(const string& saddr, in_port_t port);
174 in6_addr address() const { return addr_.sin6_addr; }
182 uint8_t operator[](int i) const { return addr_.sin6_addr.s6_addr[i]; }
187 in_port_t port() const { return ntohs(addr_.sin6_port); }
194 socklen_t size() const override { return socklen_t(SZ); }
199 const sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() const override {
200 return reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr*>(&addr_);
201 }
206 sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() override { return reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr_); }
212 const sockaddr_in6* sockaddr_in6_ptr() const { return &addr_; }
217 sockaddr_in6* sockaddr_in6_ptr() { return &addr_; }
226 string to_string() const;
227};
228
229// --------------------------------------------------------------------------
230
239std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const inet6_address& addr);
240
248inline bool operator==(const in6_addr& lhs, const in6_addr& rhs) {
249 return std::memcmp(&lhs, &rhs, sizeof(in6_addr)) == 0;
250}
251
259inline bool operator!=(const in6_addr& lhs, const in6_addr& rhs) {
260 return !operator==(lhs, rhs);
261}
